amendment.description: Amendment instructs the Director of FEMA to consider natural protective sand dunes and wetlands when developing criteria for the multi-peril insurance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 110-351 to clarify some of the priorities for wind risk criteria generation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Castor.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Castor amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
